p: First, 68 mg of mildly oxidized CNT was ultrasonically dispersed in 40 mL of ethanol. Then, 0.074 g of Co(AC) 2·4H 2O and 0.037 g of Ni(Ac) 2·4H 2O were added, and the mixture was stirred on a water bath at 80 °C for 2 h. Next, 2 mL of NH 3·H 2O and 0.078 g of thiourea were added to the solution, and the reaction mixture was stirred for 2 h. The reaction mixture was transferred to a 50-mL autoclave, followed by a hydrothermal reaction at 170 °C for 3 h. The product was cooled to room temperature and centrifuged with deionized water several times and freeze-dried. NiCo 2S 4/CNT was synthesized following the same method but without the addition of NH 3·H 2O.
